title: Request an Interlibrary Loan
description: A graduate student needs a book for their research that is not available in the university's library system.

tasks.description: Identify the student and collect the bibliographic information for the requested book (title, author, ISBN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary details for the book.

tasks.description: Search the national interlibrary loan (ILL) database to find a library that has the book.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds three libraries that own the book and can lend it.

tasks.description: Submit the ILL request to the lending library and inform the student of the estimated arrival time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the request and communicates the timeline to the student.
